usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Using big tag to display large text

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: Applying style attribute to big tag
usageExamples.code: <big style="font-size: 24px;">This is a big text with custom style</big>
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/big @style="font-size: 24px;"
	This is a big text with custom style
